price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ukuri kutagiramwo amakenga ku vyerekeye Isa mwene Mariyamu, ni ukuri kwagushikiriye kuvuye ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah. Kubera ivyo rero, shishikara utsimbataye kuri ukwo kuri, ntukabe mu bagufiseko amakenga.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takun mina al-mum'tarīna
